panels.title: Entwicklung: Videostarts für Videos im Zeitraum genutzt

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  SUM(IFNULL(views,0))/1000000 as videoViews10sMill,
  DATE(EXTRACT(YEAR from time),EXTRACT(MONTH from time), 1) as month,
 
FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly${dataset_suffix}.youtubeAnalytics${table_suffix}` as youtube
JOIN `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.profiles` as profiles ON (youtube.profileId = profiles.youtubeID AND profiles.LRA = "$LRA")
WHERE CASE "${Monat:text}"
      WHEN "Jahr" THEN EXTRACT(YEAR from time) = $Jahr
      ELSE DATE(EXTRACT(YEAR from time),EXTRACT(MONTH from time), 1) <= DATE($Jahr, $Monat, 1) AND DATE(EXTRACT(YEAR from time),EXTRACT(MONTH from time), 1)  >= DATE_SUB(DATE($Jahr, $Monat, 1), INTERVAL 12 MONTH) END 
GROUP BY month
ORDER BY month ASC

WITH filter_month_profiles as (SELECT
   REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(profile,'-',''),' ',''),',',''),'ä','ae'),'Ä','Ae'),'ö','oe'),'Ö','Oe'),'ü','ue'),'Ü','Ue'),'.',''),'!',''),'&',''),"'",""),'#',''),'🍀',''),'ß','ss') as profile,
   SUM(IFNULL(views,0)) as Views,
   CASE "${Monat:text}"
   WHEN "Jahr" THEN "year"
   ELSE CONCAT(EXTRACT(MONTH from time),'-',EXTRACT(YEAR from time)) END as month_year,
   COUNT(DISTINCT time) as days
 FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly${dataset_suffix}.youtubeAnalytics${table_suffix}` AS youtube
 JOIN `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.profiles` AS profiles
   ON youtube.profileId = profiles.youtubeID
 WHERE profiles.LRA = "$LRA"
   AND $Zeitraum 
 GROUP BY profile, month_year), filter_month_top_profiles as (
 SELECT
   month_year,
   profile,
   Views,
   days,
   ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY month_year ORDER BY Views DESC) AS profile_rank
 FROM filter_month_profiles
), filter_month_top_8_profiles AS (
 SELECT
   month_year,
   profile,
   Views,
   days
 FROM filter_month_top_profiles
 WHERE profile_rank <= 8
 ), filter_month_rest AS (
 SELECT
   month_year,
   'Rest' AS profile,
   SUM(Views) AS Views,
   MAX(days) AS days
 FROM filter_month_top_profiles
 WHERE profile_rank > 8
 GROUP BY month_year
), filter_month_top_8_rest_profiles AS (
  SELECT
   month_year,
   profile,
   Views,
   days
 FROM filter_month_top_8_profiles
 UNION ALL
 SELECT
   month_year,
   profile,
   Views,
   days
 FROM filter_month_rest
 ORDER BY month_year DESC, profile
)
SELECT profile, ROUND(Views) as Views FROM filter_month_top_8_rest_profiles

FROM(
SELECT CONCAT("$Monat_abkuerzung", " $Jahr") as Gesamt
)

SELECT
videoViews10sMill,
videoViews10sMill/days as videoViews10sMillPerDay
FROM
(SELECT
SUM(IFNULL(views,0))/1000000 as videoViews10sMill,
COUNT(DISTINCT time) as days

FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly${dataset_suffix}.youtubeAnalytics${table_suffix}` as youtube
JOIN `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.profiles` as profiles ON (youtube.profileId = profiles.youtubeID AND profiles.LRA = "$LRA")
WHERE True
AND $Zeitraum
)

SELECT CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", $filled_size_headline - CHAR_LENGTH(CONCAT("$Monat_abkuerzung", " $Jahr"))), CONCAT("$Monat_abkuerzung", " $Jahr"))
FROM(
SELECT CONCAT("$Monat_abkuerzung", " $Jahr") as Gesamt
)

WITH past_value_in_mil AS (
  SELECT
  SUM(IFNULL(views,0))/1000000 as past_sum_in_mil,
  COUNT(DISTINCT time) as days
  FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly${dataset_suffix}.youtubeAnalytics${table_suffix}` as youtube
  JOIN `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.profiles` as profiles ON (youtube.profileId = profiles.youtubeID AND profiles.LRA = "$LRA")

 
  WHERE True
  AND CASE $Monat
  WHEN 13 THEN TRUE
  ELSE EXTRACT(MONTH from time) = EXTRACT(MONTH from DATE_SUB(DATE($Jahr,$Monat,1), INTERVAL 1 MONTH)) AND EXTRACT(YEAR from time) = EXTRACT(YEAR from DATE_SUB(DATE($Jahr,$Monat,1), INTERVAL 1 MONTH)) END
), past_value_per_day AS (
  SELECT past_sum_in_mil/days as past_sum_per_day
  FROM past_value_in_mil
), current_value_in_mil AS(
  SELECT
  SUM(IFNULL(views,0))/1000000 as current_sum_in_mil,
  COUNT(DISTINCT time) as days
  FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly${dataset_suffix}.youtubeAnalytics${table_suffix}` as youtube
  JOIN `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.profiles` as profiles ON (youtube.profileId = profiles.youtubeID AND profiles.LRA = "$LRA")
  WHERE True
  AND EXTRACT(MONTH from time) = $Monat AND EXTRACT(YEAR from time) = $Jahr
), current_value_per_day AS(
  SELECT current_sum_in_mil/days as current_sum_per_day
  FROM current_value_in_mil
)
SELECT (current_sum_in_mil/past_sum_in_mil - 1)*100 as diff_mil, (current_sum_per_day/past_sum_per_day - 1)*100 as diff_per_day FROM past_value_in_mil, current_value_in_mil, current_value_per_day, past_value_per_day

SELECT CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", $filled_size_headline - CHAR_LENGTH(CONCAT("$Monat_abkuerzung", " $Jahr"))), CONCAT("$Monat_abkuerzung", " $Jahr"))
FROM(
SELECT CONCAT("$Monat_abkuerzung", " $Jahr") as Gesamt
)

WITH past_value_in_mil AS (
  SELECT
  SUM(IFNULL(views,0))/1000000 as past_sum_in_mil,
  COUNT(DISTINCT time) as days
  FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly${comp_dataset_suffix}.youtubeAnalytics${comp_table_suffix}` as youtube
  JOIN `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.profiles` as profiles ON (youtube.profileId = profiles.youtubeID AND profiles.LRA = "$LRA")
  WHERE True
  AND CASE "${Monat:text}"
  WHEN "Jahr" THEN EXTRACT(YEAR from time) = $Jahr - 1
  ELSE EXTRACT(MONTH from time) = $Monat AND EXTRACT(YEAR from time) = $Jahr - 1 END
), past_value_per_day AS (
  SELECT past_sum_in_mil/days as past_sum_per_day
  FROM past_value_in_mil
), current_value_in_mil AS(
  SELECT
  SUM(IFNULL(views,0))/1000000 as current_sum_in_mil,
  COUNT(DISTINCT time) as days
  FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly${dataset_suffix}.youtubeAnalytics${table_suffix}` as youtube
  JOIN `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.profiles` as profiles ON (youtube.profileId = profiles.youtubeID AND profiles.LRA = "$LRA")
  WHERE True
  AND $Zeitraum 
), current_value_per_day AS(
  SELECT current_sum_in_mil/days as current_sum_per_day
  FROM current_value_in_mil
)
SELECT (current_sum_in_mil/past_sum_in_mil - 1)*100 as diff_mil, (current_sum_per_day/past_sum_per_day - 1)*100 as diff_per_day FROM past_value_in_mil, current_value_in_mil, current_value_per_day, past_value_per_day

panels.title: Abonnements | Stichtag: $Stichtag

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
lm.Profil,
(lm_follower/llm_follower - 1)*100 as FollowerVeraenderung
FROM
(SELECT
subscribersLifetime as lm_follower,
profile as Profil
FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.youtubeAnalytics` as youtube
LEFT JOIN `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.profiles` as profiles ON (youtube.profileId = profiles.youtubeID AND profiles.LRA = "$LRA")

WHERE True
AND time = (SELECT MAX(time) FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.youtubeAnalytics` as youtube
            WHERE $Zeitraum)

ORDER BY subscribersLifetime desc) as lm

RIGHT JOIN

(SELECT
subscribersLifetime as llm_follower,
profile as Profil
FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.youtubeAnalytics` as youtube
-- FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly${dataset_suffix}.youtube${table_suffix}` as youtube
RIGHT JOIN `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.profiles` as profiles ON (youtube.profileId = profiles.youtubeID AND profiles.LRA = "$LRA")

WHERE True
AND
time = (SELECT MAX(time) FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.youtubeAnalytics` as youtube
            WHERE CASE "${Monat:text}"
            WHEN "Jahr" THEN EXTRACT(YEAR from time) = $Jahr - 1
            ELSE EXTRACT(MONTH from time) = EXTRACT(MONTH from DATE_SUB(DATE($Jahr, $Monat, 1), INTERVAL 1 MONTH) ) AND EXTRACT(YEAR from time) = EXTRACT(YEAR from DATE_SUB(DATE($Jahr,$Monat,1), INTERVAL 1 MONTH)) END)
ORDER BY subscribersLifetime desc) as llm ON llm.Profil = lm.Profil
ORDER BY lm.lm_follower DESC

panels.title: Videostarts für Videos im Zeitraum genutzt
Gesamte Wiedergabedauer für Videos im Zeitraum genutzt | $Month

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  CAST(
    ROUND(SUM(estimatedMinutesWatched) /(60)) as INT64
  ) as sehVolumen,
  profile as Profil

FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly${dataset_suffix}.youtubeAnalytics${table_suffix}` as youtube
JOIN `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.profiles` as profiles ON (youtube.profileId = profiles.youtubeID AND profiles.LRA = "$LRA")

WHERE
  True
  AND $Zeitraum
GROUP BY
  profile
ORDER BY
  sehVolumen desc

panels.title: Gesamte Wiedergabedauer in Stunden für Videos im Zeitraum genutzt
Top Videos nach Videostarts (Videos im Zeitraum genutzt) | $Month

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
profile as Profil,
youtube.time as Datum,
CONCAT(
  CASE WHEN LENGTH(CAST(DIV(duration,60) AS String))<2 THEN CONCAT("0",CAST(DIV(duration,60) AS String)) ELSE CAST(DIV(duration,60) AS String)  END ,
  ":",CASE WHEN LENGTH(CAST(MOD(duration,60) AS String))<2 THEN CONCAT("0",CAST(MOD(duration,60) AS String)) ELSE CAST(MOD(duration,60) AS String)  END) as Dauer,
  CONCAT(
  CASE WHEN LENGTH(CAST(DIV(averageViewDuration,60) AS String))<2 THEN CONCAT("0",CAST(DIV(averageViewDuration,60) AS String)) ELSE CAST(DIV(averageViewDuration,60) AS String)  END ,
  ":",CASE WHEN LENGTH(CAST(MOD(averageViewDuration,60) AS String))<2 THEN CONCAT("0",CAST(MOD(averageViewDuration,60) AS String)) ELSE CAST(MOD(averageViewDuration,60) AS String)  END) as averageViewTime,
  Round(estimatedMinutesWatched/60,0) as sehVolumen,
   title,
views, 
link,
likes + 
dislikes +
comments +
shares as interactions,
REGEXP_REPLACE(FORMAT('%0.1f', averageViewPercentage), r'\.', ',') AS averageViewPercentage,
abo_change,
FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly${dataset_suffix}.youtubeAnalyticsTopVideos${topvideos_suffix}` as youtube
JOIN `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.profiles` as profiles ON (youtube.profileId = profiles.youtubeID AND profiles.LRA = "$LRA")
AND True
ORDER BY views DESC LIMIT 100

panels.title: Top Videos im Zeitraum genutzt | ${Month}
Top One Video je Kanal (Videos im Zeitraum genutzt) |  $Month

targets.rawSql:
SELECT DISTINCT
  Profil,
  Datum,
  Titel,
  Wiedergaben,
  link,
  Dauer,
  Round(sehVolumen,0) as sehVolumen,
  -- averageViewPercentage,
  REGEXP_REPLACE(FORMAT('%0.1f', averageViewPercentage), r'\.', ',') AS averageViewPercentage,
FROM (
  SELECT 
  profile as Profil,
  time as Datum,
CONCAT(
  CASE WHEN LENGTH(CAST(DIV(duration,60) AS String))<2 THEN CONCAT("0",CAST(DIV(duration,60) AS String)) ELSE CAST(DIV(duration,60) AS String)  END ,
  ":",CASE WHEN LENGTH(CAST(MOD(duration,60) AS String))<2 THEN CONCAT("0",CAST(MOD(duration,60) AS String)) ELSE CAST(MOD(duration,60) AS String)  END) as Dauer,
  CONCAT(
  CASE WHEN LENGTH(CAST(DIV(averageViewDuration,60) AS String))<2 THEN CONCAT("0",CAST(DIV(averageViewDuration,60) AS String)) ELSE CAST(DIV(averageViewDuration,60) AS String)  END ,
  ":",CASE WHEN LENGTH(CAST(MOD(averageViewDuration,60) AS String))<2 THEN CONCAT("0",CAST(MOD(averageViewDuration,60) AS String)) ELSE CAST(MOD(averageViewDuration,60) AS String)  END) as averageViewTime,
  estimatedMinutesWatched/60 as sehVolumen,
  title as Titel,
  views as Wiedergaben,
  youtube.link,
  averageViewPercentage,
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY profiles.youtubeID ORDER BY 
      views DESC) as row_num
  FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly${dataset_suffix}.youtubeAnalyticsTopVideos${topvideos_suffix}` as youtube
  JOIN `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.profiles` as profiles ON (youtube.profileId = profiles.youtubeID AND profiles.LRA = "$LRA")
  
  -- WHERE True
  AND True
) as subquery
WHERE row_num = 1
ORDER BY Wiedergaben DESC

panels.title: Top One Video im Zeitraum genutzt je Kanal | $Month
Zusammenfassung aller Kanäle (Videos im Zeitraum genutzt) | $Monat $Jahr

targets.rawSql:
WITH followers as (
  SELECT
    lm.Profil,
    lm_follower as followers,
    CASE
    WHEN "${Monat:text}" = "Jahr" AND $Jahr = 2022 THEN CAST(NULL AS INT64)
    ELSE IFNULL(lm_follower - llm_follower,lm_follower) END  as FollowerVeraenderungAbsolut,
    CASE
    WHEN "${Monat:text}" = "Jahr" AND $Jahr = 2022 THEN CAST(NULL AS INT64)
    ELSE (SAFE_DIVIDE(lm_follower, llm_follower) -1) * 100 END as FollowerVeraenderung
  FROM
    (
      SELECT
        subscriberslifetime lm_follower,
        profile as Profil
      FROM
        `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.youtubeAnalytics` as youtube
        JOIN `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.profiles` as profiles ON (
          youtube.profileId = profiles.youtubeID
          AND profiles.LRA = "$LRA"
        )
      WHERE
        True
        AND time = (
          SELECT
            MAX(time)
          FROM
            `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.youtubeAnalytics` as youtube
          WHERE $Zeitraum 
        )
      ORDER BY
        subscriberslifetime desc
    ) as lm
    LEFT JOIN (
      SELECT
        subscriberslifetime as llm_follower,
        profile as Profil
      FROM
        `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly${comp_dataset_suffix}.youtubeAnalytics${comp_table_suffix}` as youtube
        JOIN `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.profiles` as profiles ON (
          youtube.profileId = profiles.youtubeID
          AND profiles.LRA = "$LRA"
        )
      WHERE
        True
        AND time = (
          SELECT
            MAX(time)
          FROM
            `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly${comp_dataset_suffix}.youtubeAnalytics${comp_table_suffix}` as youtube
          WHERE CASE "${Monat:text}"
          WHEN "Jahr" THEN EXTRACT(YEAR from time) = $Jahr - 1
          ELSE
            EXTRACT(
              MONTH
              from
                time
            ) = EXTRACT(
              MONTH
              from
                DATE_SUB(DATE($Jahr, $Monat, 1), INTERVAL 1 MONTH)
            )
            AND EXTRACT(
              YEAR
              from
                time
            ) = EXTRACT(
              YEAR
              from
                DATE_SUB(DATE($Jahr, $Monat, 1), INTERVAL 1 MONTH)
            ) END
        )
      ORDER BY
        subscriberslifetime desc
    ) as llm ON llm.Profil = lm.Profil
  ORDER BY
    lm.lm_follower DESC
),
video_start as (
  SELECT
    lm.Profil,
    lm_videoViews10s as videoViews10s,
    CASE
    WHEN "${Monat:text}" = "Jahr" AND $Jahr = 2022 THEN CAST(NULL AS INT64)
    ELSE IFNULL(lm_videoViews10s - llm_videoViews10s, lm_videoViews10s) END as videoViews10sVeraenderungAbsolut,
    CASE
    WHEN "${Monat:text}" = "Jahr" AND $Jahr = 2022 THEN CAST(NULL AS INT64)
    ELSE (
      SAFE_DIVIDE(lm_videoViews10s, llm_videoViews10s) -1
    ) * 100 END as videoViews10sVeraenderung
  FROM
    (
      SELECT
        SUM(views) as lm_videoViews10s,
        profile as Profil
      FROM
        `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.youtubeAnalytics` as youtube
        JOIN `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.profiles` as profiles ON (
          youtube.profileId = profiles.youtubeID
          AND profiles.LRA = "$LRA"
        )
      WHERE
        True
        AND $Zeitraum
      GROUP BY
        profile
      ORDER BY
        lm_videoViews10s DESC
    ) as lm
    LEFT JOIN (
      SELECT
        profile as Profil,
        SUM(views) as llm_videoViews10s,
      FROM
        `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly${comp_dataset_suffix}.youtubeAnalytics${comp_table_suffix}` as youtube
        JOIN `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.profiles` as profiles ON (
          youtube.profileId = profiles.youtubeID
          AND profiles.LRA = "$LRA"
        )
      WHERE
        True
        AND CASE "${Monat:text}" 
        WHEN "Jahr" THEN EXTRACT(YEAR from time) = $Jahr - 1
        ELSE EXTRACT(
          MONTH
          from
            time
        ) = EXTRACT(
          MONTH
          from
            DATE_SUB(DATE($Jahr, $Monat, 1), INTERVAL 1 MONTH)
        )
        AND EXTRACT(
          YEAR
          from
            time
        ) = EXTRACT(
          YEAR
          from
            DATE_SUB(DATE($Jahr, $Monat, 1), INTERVAL 1 MONTH)
        ) END 
      GROUP BY
        profile
      ORDER BY
        llm_videoViews10s DESC
    ) as llm ON llm.Profil = lm.Profil
  ORDER BY
    lm.lm_videoViews10s DESC
),
sehVolumen as (
  SELECT
    lm.Profil,
    lm_sehVolumenVariable as sehVolumenVariable,
    CASE
    WHEN "${Monat:text}" = "Jahr" AND $Jahr = 2022 THEN CAST(NULL AS INT64)
    ELSE IFNULL(lm_sehVolumenVariable - llm_sehVolumenVariable, lm_sehVolumenVariable) END as sehVolumenVariableVeraenderungAbsolut,
    CASE
    WHEN "${Monat:text}" = "Jahr" AND $Jahr = 2022 THEN CAST(NULL AS INT64)
    ELSE
    (
      SAFE_DIVIDE(lm_sehVolumenVariable, llm_sehVolumenVariable) -1
    ) * 100 END as sehVolumenVariableVeraenderung
  FROM
    (
      SELECT
        CAST(ROUND(SUM(estimatedMinutesWatched) /(60)) as INT64
  ) as lm_sehVolumenVariable,
        profile as Profil
      FROM
        `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.youtubeAnalytics` as youtube
        JOIN `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.profiles` as profiles ON (
          youtube.profileId = profiles.youtubeID
          AND profiles.LRA = "$LRA"
        )
      WHERE
        True
        AND $Zeitraum
      GROUP BY
        profile
      ORDER BY
        lm_sehVolumenVariable
        DESC
    ) as lm
    LEFT JOIN (
      SELECT
        profile as Profil,
        CAST(
    ROUND(SUM(estimatedMinutesWatched) /(60)) as INT64
  ) as llm_sehVolumenVariable,
      FROM
        `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly${comp_dataset_suffix}.youtubeAnalytics${comp_table_suffix}` as youtube
        JOIN `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.profiles` as profiles ON (
          youtube.profileId = profiles.youtubeID
          AND profiles.LRA = "$LRA"
        )
      WHERE
        True
        AND CASE "${Monat:text}"
        WHEN "Jahr" THEN EXTRACT(YEAR from time) = $Jahr - 1
        ELSE EXTRACT(
          MONTH
          from
            time
        ) = EXTRACT(
          MONTH
          from
            DATE_SUB(DATE($Jahr, $Monat, 1), INTERVAL 1 MONTH)
        )
        AND EXTRACT(
          YEAR
          from
            time
        ) = EXTRACT(
          YEAR
          from
            DATE_SUB(DATE($Jahr, $Monat, 1), INTERVAL 1 MONTH)
        ) END
      GROUP BY
        profile
      ORDER BY
        llm_sehVolumenVariable
        DESC
    ) as llm ON llm.Profil = lm.Profil
  ORDER BY
    lm.lm_sehVolumenVariable
    DESC
),
interactionen as (
  SELECT
    lm.Profil,
    lm_interactionenVariable as interactionenVariable,
    CASE
    WHEN "${Monat:text}" = "Jahr" AND $Jahr = 2022 THEN CAST(NULL AS INT64)
    ELSE
    IFNULL(lm_interactionenVariable - llm_interactionenVariable,lm_interactionenVariable) END as interactionenVariableVeraenderungAbsolut,
    CASE WHEN "${Monat:text}" = "Jahr" AND $Jahr = 2022 THEN CAST(NULL AS INT64)
    ELSE
    (
      SAFE_DIVIDE(lm_interactionenVariable, llm_interactionenVariable) -1
    ) * 100 END as interactionenVariableVeraenderung
  FROM
    (
      SELECT
       IFNULL(SUM(likes + dislikes + comments + shares),0)as lm_interactionenVariable,
        profile as Profil
      FROM
        `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.youtubeAnalytics` as youtube
        JOIN `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.profiles` as profiles ON (
          youtube.profileId = profiles.youtubeID
          AND profiles.LRA = "$LRA"
        )
      WHERE
        True
        AND $Zeitraum
      GROUP BY
        profile
      ORDER BY
        lm_interactionenVariable
        DESC
    ) as lm
    LEFT JOIN (
      SELECT
        profile as Profil,
        IFNULL(SUM(likes + dislikes + comments + shares),0) as llm_interactionenVariable,
      FROM
        `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly${comp_dataset_suffix}.youtubeAnalytics${comp_table_suffix}` as youtube
        JOIN `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.profiles` as profiles ON (
          youtube.profileId = profiles.youtubeID
          AND profiles.LRA = "$LRA"
        )
      WHERE
        True
        AND CASE "${Monat:text}"
        WHEN "Jahr" THEN EXTRACT(YEAR from time) = $Jahr - 1
        ELSE EXTRACT(
          MONTH
          from
            time
        ) = EXTRACT(
          MONTH
          from
            DATE_SUB(DATE($Jahr, $Monat, 1), INTERVAL 1 MONTH)
        )
        AND EXTRACT(
          YEAR
          from
            time
        ) = EXTRACT(
          YEAR
          from
            DATE_SUB(DATE($Jahr, $Monat, 1), INTERVAL 1 MONTH)
        ) END
      GROUP BY
        profile
      ORDER BY
        llm_interactionenVariable
        DESC
    ) as llm ON llm.Profil = lm.Profil
  ORDER BY
    lm.lm_interactionenVariable
    DESC
) 
SELECT
  followers.Profil,
  followers.followers,
  followers.FollowerVeraenderungAbsolut,
  followers.FollowerVeraenderung,
  video_start.videoViews10s,
  video_start.videoViews10sVeraenderungAbsolut,
  video_start.videoViews10sVeraenderung,
  sehVolumen.sehVolumenVariable,
  sehVolumen.sehVolumenVariableVeraenderungAbsolut,
  sehVolumen.sehVolumenVariableVeraenderung,
  interactionen.interactionenVariable,
  interactionen.interactionenVariableVeraenderungAbsolut,
  interactionen.interactionenVariableVeraenderung,
FROM
  followers
  JOIN video_start ON followers.Profil = video_start.Profil
  JOIN sehVolumen ON followers.Profil = sehVolumen.Profil
  JOIN interactionen ON followers.Profil = interactionen.Profil

targets.rawSql:
WITH followers as (
  SELECT
    lm.Profil,
    lm_follower as followers,
    CASE 
    WHEN "${Monat:text}" = "Jahr" AND $Jahr = 2022 THEN CAST(NULL AS INT64)
    ELSE IFNULL(lm_follower - llm_follower, lm_follower) END as FollowerVeraenderungAbsolut,
    CASE
    WHEN "${Monat:text}" = "Jahr" AND $Jahr = 2022 THEN CAST(NULL AS INT64)
    ELSE
    (SAFE_DIVIDE(lm_follower, llm_follower) -1) * 100 END as FollowerVeraenderung
  FROM
    (
      SELECT
        subscriberslifetime lm_follower,
        profile as Profil
      FROM
        `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.youtubeAnalytics` as youtube
        JOIN `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.profiles` as profiles ON (
          youtube.profileId = profiles.youtubeID
          AND profiles.LRA = "$LRA"
        )
      WHERE
        True
        AND time = (
          SELECT
            MAX(time)
          FROM
            `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.youtubeAnalytics` as youtube
          WHERE $Zeitraum 
        )
      ORDER BY
        subscriberslifetime desc
    ) as lm
    LEFT JOIN (
      SELECT
        subscriberslifetime as llm_follower,
        profile as Profil
      FROM
        `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly${comp_dataset_suffix}.youtubeAnalytics${comp_table_suffix}` as youtube
        JOIN `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.profiles` as profiles ON (
          youtube.profileId = profiles.youtubeID
          AND profiles.LRA = "$LRA"
        )
      WHERE
        True
        AND time = (
          SELECT
            MAX(time)
          FROM
            `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly${comp_dataset_suffix}.youtubeAnalytics${comp_table_suffix}` as youtube
          WHERE CASE "${Monat:text}"
          WHEN "Jahr" THEN EXTRACT(YEAR from time) = $Jahr - 1
          ELSE 
            EXTRACT(
              MONTH
              from
                time
            ) = EXTRACT(
              MONTH
              from
                DATE_SUB(DATE($Jahr, $Monat, 1), INTERVAL 1 MONTH)
            )
            AND EXTRACT(
              YEAR
              from
                time
            ) = EXTRACT(
              YEAR
              from
                DATE_SUB(DATE($Jahr, $Monat, 1), INTERVAL 1 MONTH)
            ) END
        )
      ORDER BY
        subscriberslifetime desc
    ) as llm ON llm.Profil = lm.Profil
  ORDER BY
    lm.lm_follower DESC
),
video_start as (
  SELECT
    lm.Profil,
    lm_videoViews10s as videoViews10s,
    CASE
    WHEN "${Monat:text}" = "Jahr" AND $Jahr = 2022 THEN CAST(NULL AS INT64)

    CASE
    WHEN "${Monat:text}" = "Jahr" AND $Jahr = 2022 THEN CAST(NULL AS INT64)
    ELSE
    IFNULL((
      SAFE_DIVIDE(lm_videoViews10s, llm_videoViews10s) -1
    ) * 100,0) END as videoViews10sVeraenderung
  FROM
    (
      SELECT
        SUM(views) as lm_videoViews10s,
        profile as Profil
      FROM
        `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly${dataset_suffix}.youtubeAnalyticsVideos${table_suffix}` as youtube
        JOIN `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.profiles` as profiles ON (
          youtube.profileId = profiles.youtubeID
          AND profiles.LRA = "$LRA"
        )
      WHERE
        True
        AND $Zeitraum

    ) as lm
    LEFT JOIN (

        ) = EXTRACT(

            DATE_SUB(DATE($Jahr, $Monat, 1), INTERVAL 1 MONTH)
        )
        AND EXTRACT(
          YEAR
          from
            time
        ) = EXTRACT(
          YEAR

        ) END
      GROUP BY
        profile

        llm_videoViews10s DESC
    ) as llm ON llm.Profil = lm.Profil
  ORDER BY

    (

    ) as lm
    LEFT JOIN (

  ) as llm_sehVolumenVariable,
      FROM
        `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly${comp_dataset_suffix}.youtubeAnalyticsVideos${comp_table_suffix}` as youtube
        JOIN `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.profiles` as profiles ON (

      WHERE

        )
      WHERE
        True
        AND $Zeitraum
      GROUP BY

        lm_interactionenVariable
        DESC
    ) as lm
    LEFT JOIN (
      SELECT
        profile as Profil,
        IFNULL(SUM(likes + dislikes + comments + shares),0) as llm_interactionenVariable,
      FROM
        `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly${comp_dataset_suffix}.youtubeAnalyticsVideos${comp_table_suffix}` as youtube
        JOIN `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.profiles` as profiles ON (
          youtube.profileId = profiles.youtubeID
          AND profiles.LRA = "$LRA"
        )
      WHERE
        True
        AND CASE "${Monat:text}"
        WHEN "Jahr" THEN EXTRACT(YEAR from time) = $Jahr - 1
        ELSE EXTRACT(

            time
        ) = EXTRACT(

          from
            DATE_SUB(DATE($Jahr, $Monat, 1), INTERVAL 1 MONTH)

        AND EXTRACT(

            time
        ) = EXTRACT(

    ) as llm ON llm.Profil = lm.Profil
  ORDER BY

) 
SELECT
  followers.Profil,
  followers.followers,
  followers.FollowerVeraenderungAbsolut,
  followers.FollowerVeraenderung,
  video_start.videoViews10s,
  video_start.videoViews10sVeraenderungAbsolut,

query.rawSql:
SELECT a.LRA
FROM (
SELECT "MDR" as LRA
UNION DISTINCT
SELECT "NDR"
UNION DISTINCT
SELECT "KiKa"
) as a
ORDER BY (
  CASE
    WHEN REGEXP_CONTAINS(LOWER("${__user.email}"), LOWER(a.LRA))
    THEN 1
    ELSE 0
  END
) DESC

query.rawSql:
WITH monthly_views AS (
  SELECT 
    REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(profile,'-',''),' ',''),',',''),'ä','ae'),'Ä','Ae'),'ö','oe'),'Ö','Oe'),'ü','ue'),'Ü','Ue'),'.',''),'','') as profile, 
    SUM(views) AS Views,
    EXTRACT(MONTH FROM time) AS month,
  FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.youtubeAnalytics` AS youtube
  JOIN `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.profiles` AS profiles 
    ON youtube.profileId = profiles.youtubeID
  WHERE profiles.LRA = "$LRA"
    AND last_update IN (
      SELECT MAX(last_update) 
      FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.youtubeAnalytics` AS youtube
      JOIN `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.profiles` AS profiles 
        ON youtube.profileId = profiles.youtubeID
      WHERE profiles.LRA = "$LRA"
    )
    AND EXTRACT(DATE FROM time) >= DATE($Jahr - 2, $Monat, 1) 
    AND EXTRACT(DATE FROM time) <= LAST_DAY(DATE($Jahr, $Monat, 1), MONTH)
  GROUP BY profile, month
), top_profiles AS (
  SELECT 
    month,
    profile,
    Views,
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY month ORDER BY views DESC) AS profile_rank
  FROM monthly_views
)
  SELECT 
    STRING_AGG(CONCAT("'", profile, "'"), ', ')
  FROM top_profiles
  WHERE profile_rank <= 8

WITH filter_month_profiles as (SELECT
    REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(profile,'-',''),' ',''),',',''),'ä','ae'),'Ä','Ae'),'ö','oe'),'Ö','Oe'),'ü','ue'),'Ü','Ue'),'.',''),'!',''),'&',''),"'",""),'#',''),'🍀',''),'ß','ss') as profile, 
    SUM(page_engaged_users) AS engagedUsers,
    FORMAT_DATE('%m-%Y', time) AS month_year
  FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.facebookInsights` AS facebook
  JOIN `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.profiles` AS profiles 
    ON facebook.profileId = profiles.facebookID
  WHERE profiles.LRA = "$LRA"
    AND EXTRACT(MONTH from time) = $Monat
    AND EXTRACT(YEAR from time) = $Jahr
  GROUP BY profile, month_year), filter_month_top_profiles as (
  SELECT 
    month_year,
    profile,
    engagedUsers,
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY month_year ORDER BY engagedUsers DESC) AS profile_rank
  FROM filter_month_profiles
), filter_month_top_8_profiles AS (
  SELECT 
    month_year,
    profile,
    engagedUsers
  FROM filter_month_top_profiles
  WHERE profile_rank <= 8 
  ), filter_month_rest AS (
  SELECT 
    month_year,
    'Rest' AS profile,
    SUM(engagedUsers) AS engagedUsers
  FROM filter_month_top_profiles
  WHERE profile_rank > 8
  GROUP BY month_year
), filter_month_top_8_rest_profiles AS (
   SELECT 
    month_year,
    profile,
    engagedUsers
  FROM filter_month_top_8_profiles
  UNION ALL
  SELECT 
    month_year,
    profile,
    engagedUsers
  FROM filter_month_rest
  ORDER BY month_year DESC, profile
) SELECT STRING_AGG(DISTINCT CONCAT("'", profile, "'"), ', ') FROM filter_month_top_8_rest_profiles

WITH filter_month_profiles as (SELECT
    REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(profile,'-',''),' ',''),',',''),'ä','ae'),'Ä','Ae'),'ö','oe'),'Ö','Oe'),'ü','ue'),'Ü','Ue'),'.',''),'!',''),'&',''),"'",""),'#',''),'🍀',''),'ß','ss') as profile, 
    SUM(page_impressions_unique) AS impressionsUnique,
    CONCAT(EXTRACT(MONTH from time),'-',EXTRACT(YEAR from time)) as month_year
  FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.facebookInsights` AS facebook
  JOIN `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.profiles` AS profiles 
    ON facebook.profileId = profiles.facebookID
  WHERE profiles.LRA = "$LRA"
    AND EXTRACT(MONTH from time) = $Monat
    AND EXTRACT(YEAR from time) = $Jahr
  GROUP BY profile, month_year), filter_month_top_profiles as (
  SELECT 
    month_year,
    profile,
    impressionsUnique,
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY month_year ORDER BY impressionsUnique DESC) AS profile_rank
  FROM filter_month_profiles
), filter_month_top_8_profiles AS (
  SELECT 
    month_year,
    profile,
    impressionsUnique
  FROM filter_month_top_profiles
  WHERE profile_rank <= 8 
  ), filter_month_rest AS (
  SELECT 
    month_year,
    'Rest' AS profile,
    SUM(impressionsUnique) AS impressionsUnique
  FROM filter_month_top_profiles
  WHERE profile_rank > 8
  GROUP BY month_year
), filter_month_top_8_rest_profiles AS (
   SELECT 
    month_year,
    profile,
    impressionsUnique
  FROM filter_month_top_8_profiles
  UNION ALL
  SELECT 
    month_year,
    profile,
    impressionsUnique
  FROM filter_month_rest
  ORDER BY month_year DESC, profile
) SELECT STRING_AGG(DISTINCT CONCAT("'", profile, "'"), ', ') FROM filter_month_top_8_rest_profiles
